alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Western Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, northern Hartford and southwestern Hampden Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hartland, or 12 miles northeast of Torrington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Enfield, Vernon, Windsor, Agawam, South Windsor, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Windsor Locks, Coventry, Stafford, Somers, Granby, East Windsor, Canton and Southwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...and western Massachusetts.
